caption.p: Four miRNAs downregulate expression of IAV mRNA and protein. QPCR (top) and Western bloting (bottom) was used to detect the effects of miR-345, miR-188-3p on PB2 expression ( a), miR-3183 on PB1 expression ( b) and miR-769-3p on NP expression ( c). Densitometry depicting the ratio of Flag-PB2, Flag-PB1 or Flag-NP to β-actin for equal protein samples is indicated. * ( P < 0.05), **( P < 0.01), ***( P < 0.001), results were significantly different from NC miRNA group
